uk.ac.glasgow.internman

Interface InternMan

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InternManImpl

    public interface InternMan
    Facade for internship management system. Implement this facade interface as the top-level class in your internship management component-based system. Acceptance test suite and user interfaces will couple with this facade.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        boolean login(java.lang.String userName,
            java.lang.String password)
        user logs into system, and is set as current user

      • getCurrentUser

        User getCurrentUser()
        get handle on current user. cf 'whoami' in bash

      • getAdvertisements

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Advertisement> getAdvertisements()
        get set of advertisements. Each ad has a unique integer label. Filter as follows: - student sees all published adverts - employer sees all adverts it has posted - co-ordinator sees all adverts

      • getStudents

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Student> getStudents()
        get set of students who are eligible to apply for placements. Map is keyed on GUID as string.

      • registerNewEmployer

        Employer registerNewEmployer(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String emailAddress)
        coordinator only. Sets up new employer in system. This should automatically create an account (username/password) for that employer.

      • getCurrentEmployer

        Employer getCurrentEmployer()
        Get handle on currently selected employer.

      • createNewAdvertisement

        Advertisement createNewAdvertisement(java.lang.String applicationDetails)
        coordinator and employer. Adds a new (not-yet-approved) advert into the system. Advert is tagged with creator name and date. Details about the placement and how to apply are included in the monolithic string.

      • selectAdvertisement

        Advertisement selectAdvertisement(java.lang.Integer index)
        all users. Get a handle on advert with supplied index. Note that this should return null if user does not have privileges to view this advert (unpublished to student, or not created by this employer).

      • selectRole

        Role selectRole(java.lang.Integer advertisementIndex,
              java.lang.Integer roleIndex)
        gets handle on a role for an advertisement, specified by index. Same permissions constraints apply as for selectAdvertisement

      • selectStudent

        Student selectStudent(java.lang.String matriculation)
        coordinator only. Gets handle on Student from supplied id. Returns null if student not in students map

      • publishAdvertisement

        void publishAdvertisement(java.lang.Integer advertisementIndex,
                        java.lang.String comment)
        coordinator only. Makes ad visible to students. Sends feedback to employer by email.

      • notifyAcceptedOffer

        void notifyAcceptedOffer(Role role,
                       java.lang.String managerName,
                       java.lang.String managerEmail)
        student only. Sends message to coordinator (email).

      • approveAcceptedOffer

        void approveAcceptedOffer(java.lang.String matriculation)
        coordinator only. Approves offer most recently accepted by student with this matriculation id.

      • assignAcademicVisitor

        void assignAcademicVisitor(java.lang.String matriculation,
                         java.lang.String visitorName)
        coordinator only. Sends email to student, visitor and employer manager to let them know about assignment.

      • recordVisitAssessment

        void recordVisitAssessment(java.lang.String matriculation,
                         UoGGrade grade,
                         java.lang.String description)
        coordinator only. Records grade for visit. Email to student and emplyer.

      • createNewSelfSourcedRole

        Role createNewSelfSourcedRole(java.lang.String title,
                            java.lang.String location,
                            java.util.Date start,
                            java.util.Date end,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            java.lang.Double salary)
        student only. Inform coordinator of independently arranged placement. Sends email to coordinator, sets up new placement details in database. Coordinator must explicitly approve self sourced role.
